resources.string: myJobCard_Library
You are leaving for job location. Do you want to continue?
Have you arrived at job location?
You are accepting this job. Do you want to continue?
You are starting this job. Do you want to continue?
You are accepting this notification. Do you want to continue?
You are rejecting this notification. Do you want to continue?
You are starting this notification. Do you want to continue?
You are completing this notification. Do you want to continue?
You are completing this task. Do you want to continue?
You are starting this task. Do you want to continue?
File size should not be more than %1$s MB
Something went wrong while downloading attachment. Please try to download again!
Something went wrong while downloading attachment. Error code: %1$s
File not found on device!
No supported application found to open this file!
It is mandatory to complete all the pending operation. Current number of Incomplete operations are: %1$d
It is mandatory to complete at least one pending operation.
It is mandatory to issue all the components. Currently un-issued components are: %1$d
It is mandatory to issue at least one of the components %1$s.
It is mandatory to upload at least one attachment.
It is mandatory to submit all the required / mandatory forms for this Job.
It is mandatory to Approve all the required / mandatory forms for this Job.
It is mandatory to record all the readings for this Job.
It is mandatory to record at least one reading for this Job.
User decision is pending for inspection lot %1$s.
